1.3.4.name: wordpress/genesis-portfolio
1.3.4.description:
DO NOT USE THIS PLUGIN ON A LIVE SITE BETA...BETA...BETA...BETA....BETA...BETA

The Genesis Portfolio plugin uses custom post types, custom taxonomies, and widgets to create a portfolio management system for Genesis child themes. This plugin is largely based on the AgentPress Listings plugin with noticeable differences & customizations.

BETA...BETA...BETA...BETA....BETA...BETA

You can use the taxonomy creation tool to create your own way of classifying portfolio. This plugin also integrates with ImageFX.

BETA...BETA...BETA...BETA....BETA...BETA

IMPOR
